EmailTemplate.name: 17.CEM.CustExMgt.none.D.N.G.13612.CDP Pay as you Go.Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Jump starting your IoT business has never been easier
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Demo or hands-on trial Kick off your IoT business: a quick demo with our experts shows you how The world’s leading connected device management solution is now available as a multi-tenant, cloud-based service. Sign up for a demo or a hands-on trial today to see how the Nokia Connected Device Platform (CDP) makes it easy to:
- Jump start your Internet of Things (IoT) business with a pay-as-you-go subscription
- Generate new revenues with innovative IoT management services - Offer the same features and functions as the largest network providers We hope to hear from you soon!
The Nokia team Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
